scripts.postbuild:hint: echo To open the site, run: yarn site
scripts.bundler:check: cross-var BUNDLE_VENDORIZE=$npm_package_config_ruby_vendorize if-env BUNDLE_VENDORIZE=true && run-s -s bundle_vendor:* || run-s -s bundle_system:*
scripts.bundle_system:info: echo Bundle Rubies using system path ..
scripts.bundle_vendor:info: echo Bundle Rubies using vendor path ..
scripts.clean-site: echo Clean up site files .. && bundle exec jekyll clean
scripts.clean:bundle-config-folder: echo Remove bundle config folder .. && shx rm -rf .bundle
scripts.clean:log-folder: echo Remove log folder .. && shx rm -rf log
scripts.clean:etc-folder: echo Remove etc folder .. && shx rm -rf etc
scripts.clean:logfiles: echo Remove various log files .. && shx rm -f *.log
scripts.clean:locks: echo Remove lock files .. && shx rm -f *.lock && shx rm -f package-lock.json
scripts.j1-site:jekyll: echo Startup the site .. && cross-var bundle exec jekyll serve --config $npm_package_config_jekyll_config_file --port $npm_package_config_jekyll_port --livereload-port $npm_package_config_jekyll_livereload_port $npm_package_config_jekyll_option_incremental $npm_package_config_jekyll_option_livereload $npm_package_config_jekyll_option_initial_build $npm_package_config_jekyll_option_watch --open 2>jekyll.log
scripts.rebuild:clean: echo Clean up site files .. && bundle exec jekyll clean
scripts.post-rebuild:hint: echo To open the site, run: yarn site
scripts.reset:start: echo Reset project to factory state ..
scripts.reset:base-clean-files: echo Cleaning up .. && npm --silent run clean
scripts.setup: npm --silent run setup-start && npm --silent run setup-base && run-s -s setup:*
scripts.setup-start: echo Setup project for first use ..
scripts.setup-base: echo Bootstrap base modules .. && echo J1 Project Base modules: > install.log && npm --silent install shx npm-run-all cross-var cross-env >> install.log && echo done.
scripts.set-env:mode: cross-var npm config set jekyll_one_com:mode $npm_package_config_mode && echo done.
scripts.setup:create-log-folder: echo Create log folder .. && shx mkdir ./log
scripts.setup:create-log-archived-folder: echo Create archived log folder .. && shx mkdir ./log/archived
scripts.setup:create-etc-folder: echo Create etc folder .. && shx mkdir ./etc && echo done.
scripts.setup:node-modules-base: echo Bootstrap project modules .. && echo J1 Project modules: >> install.log && npm --silent install >> install.log
scripts.setup:detect-os: echo Detect OS .. && cross-var if-env OS=Windows_NT && cross-var echo "OS detected: $OS" || OS=$(echo $(getos)) && echo "OS detected: $OS" && echo done.
